expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.lead: Structural design, calculations and BIM support — from concept to delivery, focused on clarity, speed and coordination.

precast.title: Precast concrete structures
precast.body: Design of precast elements (walls, slabs, beams, columns) with BIM coordination and detailing of reinforcement, connections and erection. Focus: producibility, tolerances and fast assembly.

concrete.title: Reinforced concrete structures
concrete.body: RC structural design with clear calculations, rational detailing and reliable documentation. Section and reinforcement optimization with coordination across disciplines.

steel.title: Steel structures
steel.body: Steel framing and connection detailing, solution variants and interdisciplinary coordination. Focus: precise details, constructability and efficient fabrication.

management.title: Project management
management.body: Delivery planning, task tracking and clear communication workflows. Focus: deadlines, transparency and quality control throughout the project.

code.title: Custom software solutions
code.body: Automation and tools tailored to your workflow — AutoLISP for AutoCAD, C# add-ins and utilities, and JavaScript/TypeScript web tools. Focus: faster production, fewer errors and consistent output.
